name: GOAT Minigames
description:
Minecraft Minigames developed specifically to be shown in my Youtube Let's Play series for the GOAT SMP Server. Programming and Game Design by myself, Art and Sound Assets by Mojang. 

CONTROLS

All Movement controls are W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys

Actions are Left Mouse Button

Each Minigame comes from an episode of the series starting with:

Skydiving from Season 1 into Season 2

Fighting the Wither Boss

Raiding an Ocean Monument

Catching Bees

And Leaving for a Vacation to work on compiling all of these minigames into one project.

Check out my channel here! Every episode for this season on the GOAT SMP Server I will be developing a new Minigame to showcase in the episode. Every 5 episodes I will attempt to compile them into a Minigame Compilation similar to this one!
